original: āsanakusalena bhavitabbaṁ nisajjakusalena; there bhikkhū anupakhajjantena, nave bhikkhū āsanena appaṭibāhantena, yathāpatirūpe āsane nisīditabbaṁ;
analyzed: āsana kusalena bhavitabbam nisajja kusalena there bhikkhū an upakhajjantena nave bhikkhū āsanena a paṭibāhantena yathā patirūpe āsane

original: anānākathikena bhavitabbaṁ atiracchānakathikena; sāmaṁ vā dhammo bhāsitabbo paro vā ajjhesitabbo ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo nātimaññitabbo.
analyzed: anānā kathikena bhavitabbam a tiracchāna kathikena sāmam vā dhammaḥ bhāsitabbo paraḥ vā ajjhesitabbaḥ ariyaḥ vā tuṇhībhāvaḥ na atimaññitabbaḥ

original: Saṅghena anumatena puggalena anuvijjakena anuvijjitukāmena na upajjhāyo pucchitabbo,
analyzed: saṅghena anumatena puggalena anuvijjakena anuvijjitu kāmena na upajjhāyaḥ pucchitabbo

original: na ācariyo pucchitabbo, na saddhivihāriko pucchitabbo, na antevāsiko pucchitabbo,
analyzed: na ācariyaḥ pucchitabbaḥ na saddhivihārikaḥ pucchitabbaḥ na antevāsikaḥ pucchitabbaḥ

original: na samānupajjhāyako pucchitabbo, na samānācariyako pucchitabbo, na jāti pucchitabbā,
analyzed: na samāna upajjhāyakaḥ pucchitabbaḥ na samāna ācariyakaḥ pucchitabbaḥ na jāti pucchitabbā

original: na nāmaṁ pucchitabbaṁ, na gottaṁ pucchitabbaṁ, na āgamo pucchitabbo, na kulapadeso
analyzed: na nāmam pucchitabba na gottam pucchitabba na āgamaḥ pucchitabbaḥ na kula padeso

original: Peme vā sati dose vā, chandāpi gaccheyya, dosāpi gaccheyya, mohāpi gaccheyya, bhayāpi gaccheyya.
analyzed: peme vā sati dose vā chandā api gaccheyya dosā api gaccheyya mohā api gaccheyya bhayā api gaccheyya

original: Saṅghena anumatena puggalena anuvijjakena anuvijjitukāmena saṅghagarukena bhavitabbaṁ
analyzed: saṅghena anumatena puggalena anuvijjakena anuvijjitu kāmena saṅgha garukena

original: no puggalagarukena, saddhammagarukena bhavitabbaṁ no āmisagarukena, atthavasikena
analyzed: no puggala garukena saddhamma garukena bhavitabbam no āmisa garukena atthavasikena

original: bhavitabbaṁ no parisakappikena, kālena anuvijjitabbaṁ no akālena, bhūtena anuvijjitabbaṁ
analyzed: bhavitabbam no parisakappikena kālena anuvijjitabbam no akālena bhūtena

original: no abhūtena, saṇhena anuvijjitabbaṁ no pharusena, atthasaṁhitena anuvijjitabbaṁ no
analyzed: no abhūtena saṇhena anuvijjitabbam no pharusena attha sahitena anuvijjitabbam no

original: anatthasaṁhitena, mettācittena anuvijjitabbaṁ no dosantarena, na upakaṇṇakajappinā
analyzed: anattha sahitena mettā cittena anuvijjitabbam no dosantarena na upakaṇṇaka jappinā

original: bhavitabbaṁ, na jimhaṁ pekkhitabbaṁ, na akkhi nikhaṇitabbaṁ, na bhamukaṁ ukkhipitabbaṁ,
analyzed: bhavitabba na jimham pekkhitabba na akkhi nikhaṇitabba na bhamukam ukkhipitabba

original: na sīsaṁ ukkhipitabbaṁ, na hatthavikāro kātabbo, na hatthamuddā dassetabbā.
analyzed: na sīsam ukkhipitabba na hattha vikāraḥ kātabbaḥ na hattha muddā dassetabbā

original: Āsanakusalena bhavitabbaṁ nisajjakusalena, yugamattaṁ pekkhantena atthaṁ anuvidhiyantena
analyzed: āsana kusalena bhavitabbam nisajja kusalena yuga mattam pekkhantena attham

original: sake āsane nisīditabbaṁ, na ca āsanā vuṭṭhātabbaṁ, na vītihātabbaṁ, na kummaggo sevitabbo,
analyzed: sake āsane nisīditabba na ca āsanā vuṭṭhātabba na vītihātabba na kummaggaḥ sevitabbo

original: na bāhāvikkhepakaṁ bhaṇitabbaṁ, aturitena bhavitabbaṁ asāhasikena, acaṇḍikatena bhavitabbaṁ
analyzed: na a turitena bhavitabba a sāhasikena

original: vacanakkhamena, mettācittena bhavitabbaṁ hitānukampinā, kāruṇikena bhavitabbaṁ hitaparisakkinā,
analyzed: vacana khamena mettā cittena bhavitabbam hita anukampinā kāruṇikena bhavitabbam hita parisakkinā

original: asamphappalāpinā bhavitabbaṁ pariyantabhāṇinā, averavasikena bhavitabbaṁ anasuruttena,
analyzed: a samphappalāpinā bhavitabbam pariyanta bhāṇinā a veravasikena bhavitabbam an asuruttena

original: attā pariggahetabbo, paro pariggahetabbo, codako pariggahetabbo, cuditako pariggahetabbo,
analyzed: attā pariggahetabbo paraḥ pariggahetabbo codakaḥ pariggahetabbaḥ cuditakaḥ pariggahetabbo

original: adhammacodako pariggahetabbo, adhammacuditako pariggahetabbo, dhammacodako pariggahetabbo,
analyzed: adhamma codakaḥ pariggahetabbaḥ adhamma cuditakaḥ pariggahetabbaḥ dhamma codakaḥ pariggahetabbaḥ

original: dhammacuditako pariggahetabbo, vuttaṁ ahāpentena avuttaṁ apakāsentena otiṇṇāni padabyañjanāni
analyzed: dhamma cuditakaḥ pariggahetabbaḥ vuttam a hāpentena a vuttam apakāsentena otiṇṇāni pada byañjanāni

original: sādhukaṁ pariggahetvā paro paṭipucchitvā yathā paṭiññāya kāretabbo, mando hāsetabbo,
analyzed: sādhukam pariggahetvā paraḥ paṭipucchitvā yathā paṭiññāya kāretabbaḥ mandaḥ hāsetabbo

original: bhīrū assāsetabbo, caṇḍo nisedhetabbo, asuci vibhāvetabbo, ujumaddavena na chandāgatiṁ
analyzed: bhīrū assāsetabbaḥ caṇḍaḥ nisedhetabbaḥ asuci vibhāvetabbaḥ ujumat davena na chandāgati

original: gantabbaṁ, na dosāgatiṁ gantabbaṁ, na mohāgatiṁ gantabbaṁ, na bhayāgatiṁ gantabbaṁ,
analyzed: gantabba na dosa āgatim gantabba na moha āgatim gantabba na bhaya āgatim gantabba

original: majjhattena bhavitabbaṁ dhammesu ca puggalesu ca.
analyzed: majjhattena bhavitabbam dhammesu ca puggalesu ca

original: Evañca pana anuvijjako anuvijjamāno satthu ceva sāsanakaro hoti, viññūnañca sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
analyzed: evam ca pana anuvijjakaḥ anuvijjamāno satthu ca iva sāsana karaḥ hoti viññūnam ca sabrahmacārīnam piyaḥ ca hoti manāpaḥ ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca

original: Suttaṁ saṁsandanatthāya, opammaṁ nidassanatthāya, attho viññāpanatthāya, paṭipucchā
analyzed: suttam sasandana tthāya opammam nidassana tthāya atthaḥ viññāpana tthāya paṭipucchā

original: ṭhapanatthāya, okāsakammaṁ codanatthāya, codanā sāraṇatthāya, sāraṇā savacanīyatthāya,
analyzed: ṭhapana tthāya okāsa kammam codana tthāya codanā sāraṇa tthāya sāraṇā savacanīya tthāya

original: savacanīyaṁ palibodhatthāya, palibodho vinicchayatthāya, vinicchayo santīraṇatthāya,
analyzed: savacanīyam palibodha tthāya palibodhaḥ vinicchaya tthāya vinicchayaḥ santīraṇa tthāya

original: santīraṇaṁ ṭhānāṭhānagamanatthāya, ṭhānāṭhānagamanaṁ dummaṅkūnaṁ puggalānaṁ niggahatthāya,
analyzed: santīraṇam ṭhāna aṭhāna gamana tthāya ṭhāna aṭhāna gamanam dummaṅkūnam puggalānam niggaha tthāya

original: pesalānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ sampaggahatthāya, saṅgho sampariggahasampaṭicchanatthāya, saṅghena
analyzed: pesalānam bhikkhūnam sampaggaha tthāya saṅghaḥ sampariggaha sampaṭicchana tthāya saṅghena
anumatā puggalā pacceka ṭṭhāyino avisavādaka ṭṭhāyino

original: Vinayo saṁvaratthāya, saṁvaro avippaṭisāratthāya, avippaṭisāro pāmujjatthāya, pāmujjaṁ
analyzed: vinayaḥ savara tthāya savaraḥ a vippaṭisāra tthāya a vippaṭisāraḥ pāmujja tthāya pāmujja

original: pītatthāya, pīti passaddhatthāya, passaddhi sukhatthāya, sukhaṁ samādhatthāya, samādhi
analyzed: pīta tthāya pīti passaddha tthāya passaddhi sukha tthāya sukham samādha tthāya samādhi
yathābhūta ñāṇa dassana tthāya yathābhūta ñāṇa dassanam nibbida tthāya nibbidā virāga tthāya

original: virāgo vimuttatthāya, vimutti vimuttiñāṇadassanatthāya, vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ anupādāparinibbānatthāya.
analyzed: virāgaḥ vimutta tthāya vimutti vimutti ñāṇa dassana tthāya vimutti ñāṇa dassanam anupādā parinibbāna tthāya

original: Etadatthā kathā, etadatthā mantanā, etadatthā upanisā, etadatthaṁ sotāvadhānaṁ—
analyzed: etad atthā kathā etad atthā mantanā etad atthā upanisā etad attham sota avadhāna
yat idam an upādā cittassa vimokkhaḥ ti
a rattaḥ a duṭṭhaḥ a mūḷhaḥ
